yeah its fine
its usually a nightmare if you plan on updating later though what with the dependency spectrum
Yes that's what I was afraid of, and, the "third software" is supposed to be working on the LTS because of what it works *with*.
could you not upgrade to 10.10 and fix the issue ?

i suppose the only way then is to install all of the dependencies manually
Is there any way to install the higher package numbers needed without compiling each of the packages from source?
you could add the 10.10 ppa though this might cause conflicts later

no problem

don't update via the update manager
you need to remove the ppa for 10.10 after you get the packages you need
